about_the_game:
The NEONPIXEL - Mega Landscape A set is a set of 3 packs that focuses on creating landscapes in Northern and Scottish areas.

The first pack, the WINTER TIME PACK, has assets that can be used to create icy islands, snowy villages, and small towns with a wide variety of winter vegetation.

The second pack, the LOST ISLAND PACK, is designed to add more props to Northern areas. Finally, the SCOTTISH PACK is perfect if you want to create gloomy and rainy Scottish landscapes, villages, classrooms, shops, and streets! It includes lots of materials to help you do so!

IMPORTANT NOTICE

Prior to making your purchase, kindly take note of the following:

Customers who have previously acquired "冬の町タイルセット" (English title: "Winter Town Tiles") on platforms such as STEAM, the earlier version of the RPG Maker Web Store, Degica Shop, or KOMODO Plaza (now RPG Maker Web Store), are advised to consider the following information.

This asset collection is comprised of three primary folders. As the “WINTER TIME PACK” is an remastered collection, all contents from the "冬の町タイルセット"("Winter Town Tiles") are encompassed within "WINTER TIME PACK."

Contents

--WINTER TIME PACK --

characters:25 sheet

tilesets: 6 sheet

parallaxes:31 sheet

--LOST ISLAND PACK--

characters:7 sheet

tilesets: 10 sheet

parallaxes:4 sheet

-- SCOTTISH PACK--

characters:36 sheet

tilesets: 33 sheet

parallaxes:14 sheet

faces:28 sheet

●Update

2024/10/18

Updated part of Mega Landscape A set- Scottish set V2

Tilesets:12X TILESETS

A1-DAY,NIGHT,DARK

A2-GROUNDS-DAY,NIGHT,DARK

A4-INSIDE WALLS-DAY,NIGHT,DARK

B-PROPS,WITCH SHOP-DAY,NIGHT,DARK

2024/1/25

Updated part of MEGA Landscape A Set-Lost Islands V2.

Added character, parallaxes, and tilesets materials.

The NEONPIXEL - Mega Landscape A set is a set of 3 packs that focuses on creating landscapes in Northern and Scottish areas.

The first pack, the WINTER TIME PACK, has assets that can be used to create icy islands, snowy villages, and small towns with a wide variety of winter vegetation.

The second pack, the LOST ISLAND PACK, is designed to add more props to Northern areas. Finally, the SCOTTISH PACK is perfect if you want to create gloomy and rainy Scottish landscapes, villages, classrooms, shops, and streets! It includes lots of materials to help you do so!

Prior to making your purchase, kindly take note of the following:
